title: Letterhead, "IBM Memo Sheet", ca. 1956
markings: Mead Bond with M encircled beneath and U.S.A under "m".
inscribed:
Imprinted in black ink, upper left corner hollow: IBM; upper left quadrant: Date:/ From:; (below IBM) upper left quadrant: To: office and*/ or Department:/ Attention:/ Subject and*/or Reference:; (below date...) on upper right quadrant: Carbon Copies:; bottom right corner: 10-8416-3

* printed in text
description: Cream colored letterhead with black ink.  IBM logo in black contour, upper left corner, beneath this, thin horizontal band across page; vertical thick black line intersects band, upper right.  Upper right corner, date and from whom memo sent.  Upper left quadrant,  space for information on memo recipient.  Upper right quadrant: Carbon Copies:

tombstone.epitaph:
Letterhead, "IBM Memo Sheet", ca. 1956.
ca. 1956. Offset lithograph on cream paper. Gift of Marion S. Rand. 2002-11-63.
